Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Sedgwick due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Sedgwick due to a unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Merchandise Mart and Belmont to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

These may include:
 #37 Sedgwick
#78 Montrose
#80 Irving Park
#152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
